title: Accounting documents – find and print
text: Can be done two ways: 1. Create an overview over day or week or month. Log in at the customers Backoffice. 1. Choose printouts (Udskrifter) 2. Choose transactions (Transaktioner) 3. Choose Purchase of Goods (Varekøb) (these are items that have been returned to the stock – e.g. items that have been returned by the customer) 4. Choose date from to (usually same day is enough) 5. Choose order (bestil) The customer gets a list of what has been returned that day. If they have done the return on the POS, but the accounting document has disappeard (either they tried to open the printout too quickly or they accidentally closed it before they could save/print it), they can usually find it here: 1. Open File Explorer in Windows 2. C:\POS\Reports 3. Sort by date to find the latest
description:
Can be done two ways:


    1. Create an overview over day or week or month.


Log in at the customers Backoffice.


    1. Choose printouts (Udskrifter)


    2. Choose transactions (Transaktioner)


    3. Choose Purchase of Goods (Varekøb)                                                                                                                                     (these are items that have been returned to the stock – e.g. items that have been  returned by the customer)


    4. Choose date from to (usually same day is enough)


    5. Choose order (bestil)

The customer gets a list of what has been returned that day.



If they have done the return on the POS, but the accounting document has disappeard (either they tried to open the printout too quickly or they accidentally closed it before they could save/print it), they can usually find it here:


    1.     Open File Explorer in Windows


    2.     C:\POS\Reports


    3.    Sort by date to find the latest

title: CSV files - transfer of item file to Backoffice
text: If the customer wants to transfer a CSV file with item information, we can do that, but they should be aware that this will cost about 5000 Dkr (for Danish customers), if they do not already have an agreement about transferal of 71-files. They have to fill in an Excel sheet with the item information, which can then be transfered via ftp.
description:
If the customer wants to transfer a CSV file with item information, we can do that, but they should be aware that this will cost about 5000 Dkr (for Danish customers), if they do not already have an agreement about transferal of 71-files. 

  

They have to fill in an Excel sheet with the item information, which can then be transfered via ftp.

title: Debtor – remove
text: Debtors and balance can be deleted in SQL, but this should be done through the customers finance department, who send out new debtors.
description: Debtors and balance can be deleted in SQL, but this should be done through the customers finance department, who send out new debtors.

title: Difference on financial report from previous day(s)
text: Missing sales notes in BO If a customer calls about a difference on a financial report from previous days, what we can do is lookup if any of the sales notes have not been transferred to Back Office. Usually, this is a human error, but in rare cases, the POS - if briefly interrupted by e.g. Internet issues - has not transferred all sales notes to Back Office. ATTENTION! All sales notes will always be present on the POS and they are always consecutive numbers. Log into the customers Back Office and order a transaction report for sales of goods. Check the note numbers in the report to make sure all of them are there. If one is missing, open the customer's POS and type EXPORT XXXXX (sales note number) into the shop assistant field and press the green button. It may take a bit before Back Office has updated. Order another list to see if the note has turned up and then order another financial report. If this was the issue, the difference should be gone. Unknown reason for difference If there are no sales notes missing and the above solution does not solve the difference, the issue is usually a human error and unless it's a matter of very big amounts, they will have to take it up with their bookkeeping.
description:
Missing sales notes in BO


If a customer calls about a difference on a financial report from previous days, what we can do is lookup if any of the sales notes have not been transferred to Back Office.


Usually, this is a human error, but in rare cases, the POS - if briefly interrupted by e.g. Internet issues - has not transferred all sales notes to Back Office.


ATTENTION! All sales notes will always be present on the POS and they are always consecutive numbers.


Log into the customers Back Office and order a transaction report for sales of goods.



Check the note numbers in the report to make sure all of them are there.


If one is missing, open the customer's POS and type EXPORT XXXXX (sales note number) into the shop assistant field and press the green button. It may take a bit before Back Office has updated.


Order another list to see if the note has turned up and then order another financial report. If this was the issue, the difference should be gone.


Unknown reason for difference


If there are no sales notes missing and the above solution does not solve the difference, the issue is usually a human error and unless it's a matter of very big amounts, they will have to take it up with their bookkeeping.

title: EAN code for an item is unchangeable in DdD backoffice
text: Sometime,the customer contact the support team that when they want to change EAN number for an item in backoffice,they are unable to do it and ask for support in such case. The key point here is that the customer is using an incorrect/invalid EAN number and can be verified in the below online link- Free Online Barcode Generator - Create Print-Ready Barcodes (terryburton.co.uk) When you type the EAN number in the above webpage,it can check for you that the EAN number does not exist or is invalid. Ask the customer to check again and come back with the correct EAN number for that product. In the example below,customer has shared that EAN code from 2999009490272 needs to be changed to a new ean number (5740026411728 ) but the changes does not take effect.(Freshdesk ticket number 35293). when checked in the verifier link it shows the following message. The customer is asked to provide a valid code which is in this case (5740026411828) and shows the following barcode in verifier link.
description:
Sometime,the customer contact the support team that when they want to change EAN number for an item in backoffice,they are unable to do it and ask for support in such case.

The key point here is that the customer is using an incorrect/invalid EAN number and can be verified in the below online link-
Free Online Barcode Generator - Create Print-Ready Barcodes (terryburton.co.uk)

When you type the EAN number in the above webpage,it can check for you that the EAN number does not exist or is invalid.

Ask the customer to check again and come back with the correct EAN number for that product.

In the example below,customer has shared that

EAN code from 2999009490272 needs to be changed to a new ean number (5740026411728 ) but the changes does not take effect.(Freshdesk ticket number 35293).



when checked in the verifier link it shows the following message.



The customer is asked to provide a valid code which is in this case (5740026411828) and shows the following barcode in verifier link.

title: Lists - grouped by date
text: 1. Make sure Startdate 1. Period is set for the 1. of present month and present year 2. Set stock (lager) to today's date 3. Choose how many periods of time you want and how many months every time period should contain. This would show e.g. 6 time 6 months back in time. 4. Show catalogue items (katalogvarer) and choose type of print (udskriftstypen) (supplier/product group or product group/supplier (leverandør/varegruppe eller varegruppe/leverandør) etc) 5. Show number and amount
description:
1. 1.    Make sure Startdate 1. Period is set for the 1. of present month and present year 

  

  1. 2.    Set stock (lager) to today's date 

  

  1. 3.    Choose how many periods of time you want and how many months every time period should contain. This would show e.g. 6 time 6 months back in time. 

  

  1. 4.    Show catalogue items (katalogvarer) and choose type of print (udskriftstypen) (supplier/product group or product group/supplier                                        (leverandør/varegruppe eller varegruppe/leverandør) etc) 

  

  1. 5.    Show number and amount

title: Location of backoffice printouts on your PC
text: Your printouts are visible in Backoffice, however you can also access them in a folder located on the pc the printout has been made. To find these printouts, you must go to the folder in this path: Note that "OS" is where the name of your own device/user would be. You will find all previous printouts from backoffice in the download folder at the end of this path
description:
Your printouts are visible in Backoffice, however you can also access them in a folder located on the pc the printout has been made. 


To find these printouts, you must go to the folder in this path: 

Note that "OS" is where the name of your own device/user would be. 


You will find all previous printouts from backoffice in the download folder at the end of this path

title: Missing supplier/leverandør option under vedligeholdelse in BO
text: The customer calls that they are missing supplier/provider option in the BO under maintenance button as shown in the image below. In such case, we need to create a case with owner DDD Backoffice and status Passed to development and in description write the following information. Remember Entitlement (Migration) DDD Entitlement: 108694 When the case is returned back to consultancy, we can update the customer and close the case as resolved and done.
description:
The customer calls that they are missing supplier/provider option in the BO under maintenance button as shown in the image below.  


 

In such case, we need to create a case with owner DDD Backoffice and status Passed to development and in description write the following information. 

  

Remember Entitlement    (Migration)  DDD Entitlement: 108694 

When the case is returned back to consultancy, we can update the customer and close the case as resolved and done.

title: Pricetags – reprint
text: Choose Stock -> Reprint Lables Choose date and supplier and click Search Click on the label next to the item you want to reprint labels for (and how many).
description:
Choose Stock -> Reprint Lables  

Choose date and supplier and click Search  

Click on the label next to the item you want to reprint labels for (and how many).

title: Printouts - Delete
text: If a customer has a long list of reports etc. and want them all deleted at once to clear the print list, upload satelittereport.bat to the customers desktop and run it from there. This will clear the list.
description: If a customer has a long list of reports etc. and want them all deleted at once to clear the print list, upload satelittereport.bat to the customers desktop and run it from there. This will clear the list.

title: Receipt of goods - 0 in Number Received
text: Accept Invoice number (Rechnungsnummern) button turns up and received amount is 0. This can be because the articles do not have a cost price (they have to have one) or something else is wrong in the received file.
description:
Accept Invoice number (Rechnungsnummern) button turns up and received amount is 0. 

This can be because the articles do not have a cost price (they have to have one) or something else is wrong in the received file.

title: Return – adjust inventory (juster varelager)
text: Can also be done through the POS if the register is RIAB.
description: Can also be done through the POS if the register is RIAB.

title: Sale not transferred to stock
text: Check if the sold article has a cost price and a sales price. If not, this has to be changed to at least 0.01 for both or it won't be displayed in the system.
description: Check if the sold article has a cost price and a sales price. If not, this has to be changed to at least 0.01 for both or it won't be displayed in the system.

title: Suppliers - add to BO
text: To add a new supplier: 1. Log into Backoffice 2. Choose Suppliers 3. Click Create Supplier 4. Fill in at the very least Supplier No. and Name 5. Set currency if it is different from what is already listed 6. Click create
description:
To add a new supplier:


1. Log into Backoffice


2. Choose Suppliers


3. Click Create Supplier


4. Fill in at the very least Supplier No. and Name


5. Set currency if it is different from what is already listed


6. Click create

title: Variant statistics - wrong numbers in number of items in Backoffice
text: Variant history (Varianthistorik) shows all transactions made for a specific item. They can also order a printout of an invoice overview down to style level.
description:
Variant history (Varianthistorik) shows all transactions made for a specific item. 

 

They can also order a printout of an invoice overview down to style level.

title: Webshop - transfer of items
text: Choose Maintenance -> Catalogue Items -> and check all the way to Variant to see if there's a tick in Webshop.
description: Choose Maintenance -> Catalogue Items -> and check all the way to Variant to see if there's a tick in Webshop.

title: DDD backoffice is showing as a blank white page
text: If the website is showing as a blank white site, you need to update the URL as well as the bookmark in the browser. Update the link with: dddbackoffice.com Make sure the customer doesn't have an old link lying around
description:
If the website is showing as a blank white site, you need to update the URL as well as the bookmark in the browser. 


Update the link with: 


dddbackoffice.com


Make sure the customer doesn't have an old link lying around

title: Client/Shopnumber
text: Issue: The client number must be the same as the shop number. (i.e. 500001 is shop number 1 for itemtransfer and inventory) This is not always the case, since some franchise clients fx have a number like 500502. Since the system only handles 2 digits shop numbers for itemtransfer and inventory, the client number and the shop number sometimes could be different. When a shop is set up for transfer in admin, the shop name is appended to POSConfig>StoreTransfer. There is a check on the first 20 characters. The shop name is written to POS>Stores and the shop number is set to the shop number stated in the file “butikker.$$$”. I.e. the shop number does not have to be the same as the client number anymore. The shop number can be set in DdD supporttool. It is still highly recommended, that the client number and the shopnumber, as far as possible, are the same.
description:
Issue: The client number must be the same as the shop number. (i.e. 500001 is shop number 1 for itemtransfer and inventory)

This is not always the case, since some franchise clients fx have a number like 500502. Since the system only handles 2 digits shop numbers for itemtransfer and inventory, the client number and the shop number sometimes could be different.

When a shop is set up for transfer in admin, the shop name is appended to POSConfig>StoreTransfer. There is a check on the first 20 characters. The shop name is written to POS>Stores and the shop number is set to the shop number stated in the file “butikker.$$$”.

I.e. the shop number does not have to be the same as the client number anymore. The shop number can be set in DdD supporttool.

It is still highly recommended, that the client number and the shopnumber, as far as possible, are the same.

title: Changing tax/VAT in backoffice.
text: Every year,the tax laws are regulated and most of the time the vat percentage is increased. In order to meet the sales data,the VAT value must be updated in backoffice as desired in order to make the transactions/sales compatiable with the new VAT rate. The task needs to be done by the customer itself as shown in the below screenshot. In case of changes to take effect on all concerning POS'es ,a scrift needs to be sent to all POS'es in question by the drift for that specific date. 1-Login to backoffice 2-Go to Maintenance 3-Select Moms 4-Change VAT according to the requirement. 5-Finally,Click on update.
description:
Every year,the tax laws are regulated and most of the time the vat percentage is increased.

In order to meet the sales data,the VAT value must be updated in backoffice as desired in order to make the transactions/sales compatiable with the new VAT rate.

The task needs to be done by the customer itself as shown in the below screenshot.

In case of changes to take effect on all concerning POS'es ,a scrift needs to be sent to all POS'es in question by the drift for that specific date.

1-Login to backoffice
2-Go to Maintenance
3-Select Moms
4-Change VAT according to the requirement.
5-Finally,Click on update.

title: Login/ok button not working
text: In case a button is not responsive while at the DDD backoffice login screen, usually it is a windows/browser scaling bug. The solution is to change the zoom of the browser window. Usually to 90% When this has been done, the buttons are most likely responsive again.
description:
In case a button is not responsive while at the DDD backoffice login screen, usually it is a windows/browser scaling bug. 



The solution is to change the zoom of the browser window. Usually to 90%



When this has been done, the buttons are most likely responsive again.
